ing: 2 (12 ounce) cans coconut-flavored sparkling water (such as La CroixÂ®)
12 fluid ounces diet cranberry juice drink (such as Ocean SprayÂ®)
des: "A refreshing thirst quencher that's not loaded with calories and sugar and has just the right balance of sweet-tart. This is the perfect beverage for anybody watching their calories but still looking for full flavor."
ins:
Stir coconut-flavored sparkling water, cranberry juice drink, and lime juice together in a pitcher.
Fill glasses with ice cubes. Pour sparkling water mixture over ice; garnish with sliced lime.
